input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is CASDActor
version The CA Service Desk Application version. The current supported version is v12.1

item-type The item-type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values are: 1.update-change 2.update-incident

items The items XML that will be used to update entities like change. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Sample: XML Sample of Update Change:
